scripts.generate:types: cd ../../ && supabase gen types typescript --local > packages/types/db.ts && biome check --apply .
scripts.reset: cd ../../ && supabase db reset || supabase start
scripts.lint: cd ../../ && supabase db lint && biome check --apply .
scripts.lint:check: cd ../../ && supabase db lint && biome check .
scripts.deploy: cd ../../ && supabase link --project-ref $SUPABASE_PROJECT_REF && supabase db push
